name: Large Box Bag - Merry Trees in Cream
description:
My Large Box Bags are perfect for carrying Sweater WIPs, large shawls, or any other large knitting / crochet project. You could also use your Large Box Bag to carry all your small projects together :) 
Please see the last photo for the lining fabric.

~ There are no exposed seams on the inside of my box bags, so it looks as pretty on the inside as it does on the outside :) 
~The interior, exterior and handle fabrics are lined with interfacing which not only makes the bag more durable, but allows it to keep its boxy shape. 
~ Top-stitching along both sides of the zipper
~ Fabric zipper pull tabs (never nylon or ribbon)
~ Fabric handle (never nylon or ribbon)
~ Always sewn with 100% cotton thread in a coordinating color
~ All fabrics are high quality 100% quilt weight cotton

Bag Dimensions: approx: 11 1/2" L x 5 3/4" W x 4 1/2" H

Care Instructions:
Spot clean - Air dry
Machine wash - Gentle Cycle / Air dry / Warm iron

All items are made by me with lots of love and care. 
Our home is smoke-free, but not cat free :) All fabric is stored in a closed cabinet and all finished products are stored in sealed plastic totes. Please let me know if you have any questions.

name: Small Drawstring Bag - "Too Cute to Spook" Monster Scene
description:
This bag would be perfect to carry around your smaller knitting or crochet projects. Think socks, mittens, hats!! The last picture shows the lining fabric.

**Please note, this drawstring bag also has two interior pockets**

I want this bag to last you forever!!
~ 100% high quality quilt weight cotton
~ two interior pockets
~ fabric drawstrings four layers of fabric thick (never nylon cording or ribbon) with top stitching on both sides for extra durability
~ 100% cotton woven fusible interfacing keeps the bag soft, but makes it incredibly durable
~ interior edges of the drawstring channel sewn with an overlocking stitch to prevent fraying when pulling the drawstrings
~ reinforced stitches at the drawstring channel openings
~ sewn with 100% cotton thread in a color to coordinate with the fabrics

Small Drawstring Bag Dimensions:
Height: 10"
Width: 10"
Depth: 3"

Care Instructions:
Spot clean - Hand wash / Air dry
Machine wash - Gentle Cycle / Air dry / Warm iron

All items are made by me with lots of love and care. 
Our home is smoke-free, but not cat free :) All fabric is stored in a closed cabinet and all finished products are stored in sealed plastic totes. Please let me know if you have any questions!
